title: Customized mathematics literacy enhancement workshop for advanced readers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematics concepts and problem-solving skills at lower elementary levels
context.additional_context: A program supporting adult learners in effectively analyzing elementary math textbooks for their children’s education. Emphasizes self-directed learning design reflecting advanced readers’ characteristics and real-life application examples

learning_goals: Learners can extract core concepts and logical structures from mathematical texts (problems, explanatory texts, etc.) with 90% accuracy
Learners can generate three or more higher-order questions necessary for explaining mathematical reasoning processes
Learners can select two or more math content types that motivate reading (puzzles, real-life examples, etc.) and apply them to actual educational scenarios
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
